thread.title: The Camellia Bowl: Everything you need to know
thread.title_full: The Camellia Bowl: Everything you need to know

author: Mark Wilder
title: The Camellia Bowl: Everything you need to know
text: The Camellia Bowl: Everything you need to know - WSFA.com Montgomery Alabama news. Member Center: The Camellia Bowl: Everything you need to know Posted: mwilder@wsfa.com MONTGOMERY, AL (WSFA) - Be prepared for the Raycom Media Camellia Bowl 2015. It happens December 19, 4:30 p.m. CT, Cramton Bowl, Montgomery, AL. Did you know that the first football game in the south to be played at night was at Cramton Bowl. Click to read more about the game . The Legacy Club, ESPN Zone, Wind Creek Hospitality Suite, reserved tickets, general admission... buy the tickets you want here . Who will represent the MAC and Sun Belt conferences in the Camellia Bowl? Support the sponsors who make the Camellia Bowl possible. See you at the game! Copyright 2015 WSFA 12 News . All rights reserved. SPORTSmore >> SPORTS More>> Updated: Thursday, October 22 2015 11:24 AM EDT 2015-10-22 15:24:51 GMT Be prepared for the Raycom Media Camellia Bowl 2015.
